golden_diagnosis: Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 10,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia 12,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 9,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 8,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 11,Naxos disease/Naxos disease,Desminopathy/Myopathy, myofibrillar, 1,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 2,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 5,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 1,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 4,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 3,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 6,Desminopathy/Myopathy, myofibrillar, 1,致心律失常性右室发育不良/心肌病（ARVD/C）/Arrhythmogenic right ventriculardysplasia/ cardiomyopathy; ARVD/C,Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia, familial, 13
predict_diagnosis:
1. Neonatal Marfan syndrome
2. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, cardiovascular type
3. Loeys-Dietz syndrome
4. Mitral valve prolapse syndrome with systemic manifestations
5. Cardiomyopathy (dilated or hypertrophic) with associated valve disease
6. Mixed connective tissue disease with significant cardiac involvement
7. Hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia with cardiopulmonary manifestations
8. Aortopathies with valve and vascular involvement (e.g., Takayasu arteritis)
9. Familial thoracic aortic aneurysm and dissection syndrome
10. Autoimmune myocarditis with multi-valve involvement and systemic complications

Please note that the given clinical presentation could suggest a wide range of conditions, and the list above includes various rare diseases with overlapping features. A precise diagnosis would require a comprehensive clinical evaluation, detailed family history, genetic testing, and additional diagnostic tests such as echocardiography, imaging studies, and possibly biopsy of affected tissues.
